name: desafio_tecnico_xp
description: Este projeto foi desenvolvido para etapa de Desafio TÃ©cnico do processo seletivo dos alunos da Turma XP da Trybe.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd customers && npm start" "cd auth && npm start" "cd accounts && npm start" "cd stocks && npm start" "cd orders && npm start" "cd wallets && npm start" "node server.js"
scripts.installDeps: concurrently "cd customers && npm install" "cd auth && npm install" "cd accounts && npm install" "cd stocks && npm install" "cd orders && npm install" "cd wallets && npm install" "npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd customers && npm run dev" "cd auth && npm run dev" "cd accounts && npm run dev" "cd stocks && npm run dev" "cd orders && npm run dev" "cd wallets && npm run dev" "nodemon server.js"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd accounts && npm test" "cd orders && npm test"
